properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the InMemory event consumer.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.parallel
properties.description: Whether to process multiple handlers in parallel for the same event.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.max-concurrency
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent handler executions.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.timeout-ms
properties.description: Event processing timeout in milliseconds. 0 means no timeout.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.enable-retry
properties.description: Whether to enable retry mechanism for failed event processing.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed events.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.retry-delay-ms
properties.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds.

properties.name: ball.event.consumer.inmemory.enable-debug-logging
properties.description: Whether to enable debug logging for event processing.
